title: Void Illaoi
body:
Cmon Riot... we are all thinking about it.

Elder god, tentacles? sounds alot like the Old Gods, but that aside Void Illaoi would be one hell of a release skin.

replies.body: We thought it was a pretty good idea, too! ;D She's hitting PBE now!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=O1XOTWdN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-11T00:04:16.524+0000)
>
> We thought it was a pretty good idea, too! ;D She's hitting PBE now!

(Half-serious, Half Joking): The dafuq?! and when she is out and they pair her with Annie. People will forget "Graves can't have a cigar" with "Vel'koz can't play with annie"

itÂ´s a good skin... but to be honest there seem to be not much work put into this one :S she looks the same but with void theme tacked onto, not like Fizz for example where he changes quite a bit, her armor is yellowish and her skin purplish, aside from that I dont see anything that reads "void" :S
